name: twitch-tuner
description: A Chrome extension that notifies users when their favorite Twitch.tv streamers are live.

scripts.css:pack: mkdirp pkg/css && stylus app/css/options.styl app/css/popup.styl -o pkg/css
scripts.pack: npm run js:pack && npm run css:pack && npm run img:pack && npm run html:pack && npm run manifest:pack
scripts.watch-pack: parallelshell 'npm run js:watch' 'npm run css:watch' 'npm run img:watch' 'npm run html:watch' 'npm run manifest:watch'
